title: JavaScript for Beginners
description: Learn the fundamentals of JavaScript, including variables, loops, and functions. Build interactive web pages with real-world examples.

reviews.comment: Great course! Very well explained for beginners.
Good introduction, but could use more exercises.

title: Advanced Python
description: Deep dive into Python with topics like OOP, file handling, multithreading, and web scraping. Ideal for intermediate learners.

reviews.comment: Loved the advanced topics! The projects were really useful.
Good course, but requires prior Python experience.

title: Web Development Bootcamp
description: Master full-stack web development with hands-on projects using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Node.js, and React.

reviews.comment: Amazing course! Covers everything from front-end to back-end.
Good content, but some topics felt rushed.

title: React.js for Frontend Developers
description: Learn how to build modern, scalable web applications using React.js, hooks, state management, and component-based architecture.

reviews.comment: Excellent hands-on course for React beginners!
Very informative, but could use more real-world projects.
